content.description:
Thomas Nast, “Uncle Sam’s Thanksgiving Dinner,” 1869, drawn in support of the Fifteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution
Courtesy of the Library of Congress
content.question: People who shared the views expressed in the image most likely supported which of the following?

choices.label: The extension of political opportunities to formerly enslaved people
The rejection of suffrage rights for women
The expansion of the power of Southern Democrats
The enforcement of temperance laws in the North

content.answer: The extension of political opportunities to formerly enslaved people
